subject: RE: Reminder: Order #SSN3146, how did it go?
description_text:
I would like to return the ultra control box as I was lead to believe (when I contacted your store on ali express)  that it would work with my pedals and it doesn't.
                     Regards,Mike


Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------
From: SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io>
Date: 25/11/2025 17:21 (GMT+00:00)
To: mrharris1@hotmail.co.uk
Subject: Reminder: Order #SSN3146, how did it go?

Hello mike, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
